attributes.action: Stop the availablity of peoples personal details on the land registry website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Petition is to stop the members of the public having their details available from the land registry online for the small charge of £3.00 as this may lead to identity theft as details such as signitures and bank details are all avaliable from this site. This is a possiable source for I.D criminals who can exploit this service.
